name: Leadtail
description: Online Marketing and Social Media Agency
overview:
Leadtail is an agency focused on making online marketing and social media work for business.

The Leadtail team has developed and implemented social media programs and campaigns for leading consumer and business brands including TiVo, Alcatel-Lucent, Symantec, Avaya, and Xerox PARC; and technology startups such as PunchTab, Socialtext, and Zuberance.

products.name: Leadtail Small Business Advertising Channel - Reach 1 Million+ Small Business Owners
Leadtail $99 Promote Your Business Program - Get the word out about your business for only $99/mo
Leadtail Small Business Publisher Program - Grow your small business audience & ad revenue
